markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 58 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 56 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 53 [Manifestation Of Dahak](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1596) **Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 63 **Perception** +46; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (precise) 120 feet, smoke vision **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Orcish](/Languages.aspx?ID=9), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 200 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +38, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +45, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +45, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +45, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +38, [Dragon Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +48, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +48, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +40, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +40, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +38 **Str** +12 **Dex** +8 **Con** +10 **Int** +8 **Wis** +8 **Cha** +9 **Smoke Vision** Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke. --- **AC** 52 **Fort** +42 **Ref** +36 **Will** +38 +2 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 600 **Immunities** [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Resistances** [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) 26, [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 26, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 26, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 26 **Weaknesses** good 26 **Dragonstorm Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) 10 feet, 10d6 damage split evenly between acid, cold electricity, fire, and poison (DC 45 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save)
**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 120 feet, DC 45
**Imprisoned** Dahak's manifestation can't physically exit the Adamantine Fen until conditions are right, as described in Dahak Escapes on page 65. Planar travel effects do not allow it to escape, nor can they banish it from the Adamantine Fen.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** Jaws only.
**Redirect Energy** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Trigger** A creature within 100 feet casts an [acid](/Rules.aspx?ID=329), [cold](/Rules.aspx?ID=329), [fire](/Rules.aspx?ID=329), [electricity](/Rules.aspx?ID=329), or [poison](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) spell, or such a spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet. **Effect** The manifestation of Dahak makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster. --- **Speed** 60 feet, fly 200 feet **Melee** claw +44 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 8d8+8 slashing **Melee** jaws +44 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 5d10+10 piercing plus 4d6 fire and [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Melee** tail +43 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 6d10+12 slashing plus [Improved Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=29) **Melee** wing +43 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 8d8+8 slashing **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 48, attack +44 - **Cantrips (10th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (×2) - **2nd** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) - **4th** [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2) - **5th** [Abyssal Plague](/Spells.aspx?ID=1), [Drop Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=92), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) - **6th** [Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24) (×2), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) - **7th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116) - **8th** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) - **9th** [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186), [Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336) - **10th** [Miracle](/Spells.aspx?ID=196) **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** 2d10+10 plus 2d6 fire **Draconic Frenzy** The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order. **Draconic Momentum** The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a Strike. **Dragonstorm Breath** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The manifestation of Dahak breathes a blast of dragonstorm energy that deals 5d6 acid, 5d6 cold, 5d6 electricity, 5d6 fire, and 5d6 poison damage in a 60-foot cone (DC 48 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). It can't use Dragonstorm Breath again for 1d4 rounds. **Focused Breath Weapon** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The manifestation of Dahak breathes a blast of energy that deals 12d12 damage in a 90-foot line (DC 44 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The type of damage this Breath Weapon deals can be acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison, as chosen by the manifestation when it attacks. The manifestation can't use its focused Breath Weapon again for 2 rounds, and the next time it uses its Breath Weapon, it must deal a different type of damage than the previous usage.
name: Manifestation Of Dahak

spell_markdown: [Abyssal Plague](/Spells.aspx?ID=1), [Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Divine Wrath](/Spells.aspx?ID=86), [Drop Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=92), [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186), [Miracle](/Spells.aspx?ID=196), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
text: Manifestation Of Dahak Recall Knowledge - Dragon (Arcana): DC 58 Unspecific Lore : DC 56 Specific Lore : DC 53 Manifestation Of Dahak Source Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises pg. 63 Perception +46; darkvision, scent (precise) 120 feet, smoke vision Languages Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Elven, Infernal, Jotun, Orcish, Sylvan; telepathy 200 feet Skills Acrobatics +38, Arcana +45, Athletics +45, Deception +45, Diplomacy +38, Dragon Lore +48, Intimidation +48, Occultism +40, Religion +40, Society +38 Str +12 Dex +8 Con +10 Int +8 Wis +8 Cha +9 Smoke Vision Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the concealed condition from smoke. --- AC 52 Fort +42 Ref +36 Will +38 +2 status to all saves vs. magic HP 600 Immunities fire, paralyzed, sleep Resistances acid 26, cold 26, electricity 26, poison 26 Weaknesses good 26 Dragonstorm Aura (aura, divine, evocation) 10 feet, 10d6 damage split evenly between acid, cold electricity, fire, and poison (DC 45 basic Reflex save) Frightful Presence (aura, emotion, fear, mental) 120 feet, DC 45 Imprisoned Dahak's manifestation can't physically exit the Adamantine Fen until conditions are right, as described in Dahak Escapes on page 65. Planar travel effects do not allow it to escape, nor can they banish it from the Adamantine Fen. Attack of Opportunity Reaction Jaws only. Redirect Energy Reaction (abjuration, divine) Trigger A creature within 100 feet casts an acid, cold, fire, electricity, or poison spell, or such a spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet. Effect The manifestation of Dahak makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster. --- Speed 60 feet, fly 200 feet Melee Single Action claw +44 (Agile, Magical, reach 15 feet), Damage 8d8+8 slashing Melee Single Action jaws +44 (Fire, Magical, reach 20 feet), Damage 5d10+10 piercing plus 4d6 fire and Improved Grab Melee Single Action tail +43 (Magical, reach 25 feet), Damage 6d10+12 slashing plus Improved Push Melee Single Action wing +43 (Agile, Magical, reach 20 feet), Damage 8d8+8 slashing Divine Prepared Spells DC 48, attack +44 - Cantrips (10th) Detect Magic, Divine Lance, Guidance, Read Aura, Shield - 1st Command, Ray of Enfeeblement (×2) - 2nd Heal (×2), See Invisibility - 3rd Blindness, Chilling Darkness, Vampiric Touch - 4th Divine Wrath, Heal (×2) - 5th Abyssal Plague, Drop Dead, Heal - 6th Blade Barrier (×2), Spirit Blast - 7th Dispel Magic, Eclipse Burst, Finger of Death - 8th Harm, Heal - 9th Massacre, Telepathic Demand - 10th Miracle Constrict Single Action 2d10+10 plus 2d6 fire Draconic Frenzy Two Actions The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order. Draconic Momentum The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a Strike. Dragonstorm Breath Two Actions (Divine, Evocation) The manifestation of Dahak breathes a blast of dragonstorm energy that deals 5d6 acid, 5d6 cold, 5d6 electricity, 5d6 fire, and 5d6 poison damage in a 60-foot cone (DC 48 basic Reflex save). It can't use Dragonstorm Breath again for 1d4 rounds. Focused Breath Weapon Single Action (Divine, Evocation) The manifestation of Dahak breathes a blast of energy that deals 12d12 damage in a 90-foot line (DC 44 basic Reflex save). The type of damage this Breath Weapon deals can be acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison, as chosen by the manifestation when it attacks. The manifestation can't use its focused Breath Weapon again for 2 rounds, and the next time it uses its Breath Weapon, it must deal a different type of damage than the previous usage.
